attributes.action: To stop bonuses and extra payments to Directors and staff of banks being bailed out by the taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We The savers in the Northern Rock and other banks disagree that bonuses of any kind should be payed to any staff, while savers and borrowers have not had interest rate cuts passed on and also we have not been given our shares back.
The workers should be glad they have jobs still and all the overtime they have been working since this fiasco started.
I and many other savers decided to leave our money with Rock but are treat with contempt. I have a friend who works there and he thinks it is okay to reposess peoples houses !no matter what the circumsatnces and still gets his pay and overtime out of the very peoples taxes he wants to put on the streets

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
